subject: RE: [junit] Code is fast with JUnit but rediculously slow when run through its own main
msgSnippet: ... My setUp() contained some static setting that weren t set by the default when the app started. Morten
messageBody:
> > Yes, I could expand but it's rather specific to the app we're
> > working on.
>
> Sure, but I'd like to understand how come invoking your application from
> main() made it behave so differently from invoking from the test runner?
>

My setUp() contained some static setting that weren't set by the default
when the app started.

Morten
